mapper.select: select a.sidocode, avg ,lat,lng, b.sidoName as name from AVGsido a join sidocode b on left(b.sidocode,2) = a.sidocode
select a.sigungucode, avg ,lat,lng, b.gugunName as name from AVGgugun a join guguncode b on left(b.guguncode,5) = a.sigungucode
select a.dongcode, avg ,lat,lng, b.dongName as name from AVGdong a join dongcode b on b.dongcode = a.dongcode
select a.sigungucode, avg ,lat,lng, b.gugunName as name from AVGgugun a join guguncode b on left(b.guguncode,5) = a.sigungucode where left(b.guguncode,2)=#{sido}
